title: Amazon’s HQ2 Aimed to Show Tech Can Boost Cities. Now It’s on Pause
description: Arlington, Virginia, won a US-wide contest to host Amazon’s second headquarters. More than half of the giant project is now indefinitely delayed.

title: A Native Son of Palo Alto Thinks His Hometown Will Kill Us All
description: Author Malcolm Harris argues that the economic and technological ills of society can all be traced back to one city in the heart of Silicon Valley.

title: Welcome to the Museum of the Future AI Apocalypse
description: The new Misalignment Museum in San Francisco is a memorial to an imagined future in which artificial general intelligence kills most of humanity.

title: New Crypto Mixer Promises to Be Tornado Cash Without the Crime
description: Privacy Pool founder says he can preserve users’ privacy while keeping money launderers and regulators at bay.
